name: R plugin
tagline: R language plugin for IntelliJ platform.
body:
### R plugin
The R plugin for PyCharm and IntelliJ provides smart editing for R scripts. It's open source and cross-platform.

It includes syntax-highlighting editor that supports direct code execution, integrated console, builtin visual debugger, package manager and more.


### Features

Smart editing for R scripts
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/master/resources/images/editing.png)

Visual debugger
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/master/resources/images/debug.png)

Package management
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/master/resources/images/packages.png)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/master/resources/images/packages2.png)

Hice builtin help
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/master/resources/images/help.png)

And even built-in graphics toolwindow
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/master/resources/images/graphics.png)

### Authors and Contributors
Plugin was built with the help of Liana Bakradze (@medvector), Semyon Proshev (@sproshev), Alexandra Vesloguzova (@avesloguzova), and Alexander Podkhalyuzin (@Alefas).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with plugin? Please, file an issue in [our tracker](https://github.com/ktisha/TheRPlugin/issues) and weâ€™ll help you.
